'''''Belegost''''' is a video game in which you go into the ancient city [[Belegost]] and must retrieve a jewel named the ''Alqualamir''.<ref>[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=CON&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=6 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 7 (retrieved 30 December 2010)</ref><ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/belegost.html Belegost] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 30 December 2010)</ref> It is written and designed by [[Miroslav Fidler]] and [[Frantisek Fuka]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref>[http://www.worldofspectrum.org/infoseek.cgi Belegost] at [[wikipedia:World of Spectrum|World of Spectrum]] (retrieved 30 December 2010)</ref>
